short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ThoughtPad is an auto-saving online notepad. You can type anything on new tab and it will autosave it in your browers cache.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ThoughtPad is an autosaving notepad that opens up in a new tab. Type whatever you want & it is saved in your browsers' cache memory. The data is saved across sessions and can be retained/recovered even if your computer unexpectedly crashes & restarts.
